Body:
pid = 2346
async with connect_dummy(Commands.execute_process_echo_asdf, pid) as client:
    event = asyncio.Event()

    async def on_exit(_pid, exit_code):
        assert _pid == pid
        assert exit_code == 0
        event.set()
    assert await client.execute_process('echo', 'asdf', on_exit=on_exit) == pid
    await event.wait()
pytest.mark.asyncio
